title: Lol Launcher Not Opening
body: So I haven't played on my league of legends on my old computer for a few  days and when I came back it didn't open. The logo showed up for about 3 seconds then closed with nothing opening after. I have tried deleting the lol launcher file in RADS. I have also tired reinstalling the game. Please help me.

replies.body:
There could be literally any reason for that to be happening. 1. Incompatibility with patch 4.21, which I can't really help you with here. 2. Connection issues not allowing your patcher to open/work. 3. The modification of your files (deleting a specific folder) not allowing League to successfully (re)install.

If it's 3., then completely removing League from your computer using your Control Panel and then reinstalling should work. If it's 2., it gets a bit worse. [Try going through these solutions first](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), and if that doesn't help, [this](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues).
